name: DEUS EX MACHINA: Episode 1
description:
[Game Scenario]
In 2099, find out the secret base of the mad scientist who threatens the world and destroy his crazy plans to save the planet.
Using your terrific observation, explore into the game and discover secrets.
※ Every little clue can come out every single moment

[Game Description]
DEM is a VR escape room series, planned creating until episode 4.
Experience the realistic future of 2099 via VR, accompanined with the sophisticated humanoid agency DEM.
Tackle the fascinating story together with the passionate characters.

[Game Features]
-3 language full voice supported
-Enjoy a rhythimcal action gameplay with interactions of the visually displayed codes
-No jumpscares - The developers detest them:(
-VR Escape
